caption: A cinematic orchestral piece with sweeping strings, French horns, and epic percussion. The arrangement builds from a delicate piano motif to a triumphant full orchestra climax, evoking adventure and heroic journeys.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Beyond the mountains far away
Where legends live and heroes stay
A journey calls my restless heart
Time for my story to start

[Chorus]
Into the unknown I will go
Through the fire through the snow
With courage as my guiding star
I'll travel near and far
Into the unknown

[Verse 2]
Ancient maps and whispered tales
Through stormy seas and hidden trails
The world awaits with open arms
Its mysteries and charms

[Chorus]
Into the unknown I will go
Through the fire through the snow
With courage as my guiding star
I'll travel near and far

[Bridge]

Every step a leap of faith
Every dawn a brand new day

[Final Chorus]
Into the unknown I will go
With courage as my guiding star
Into the unknown

[Outro]
